extensionDescription.message: Replaces the user's homepage with a session based bookmarks manager.
extensionDescription.description: Puts bookmarks where they're most useful - the default view in each new tab.

openInTab.description: Opens bookmark in a new tab within the current window.

openInWindow.description: Opens bookmark in a new window.

openInPrivateWindow.description: Opens bookmark in a new private window.

editBookmark.description: Edit the bookmark label and url.

cutBookmark.description: Remove the bookmark and place it on the clipboard.

copyBookmark.description: Copy the bookmark onto the clipboard.

pasteBookmark.description: Insert the clipboard contents at this location.

createBookmark.description: Create a new bookmark from the selected tab.

contextMenuLabel.description: How context menus per item are accessed.

contextMenuOptionBoth.description: Available via right click or visible on the item.

rootFolderLabel.description: Which bookmarks folder should HomeBooks manage.

openFolderInCurrentWindow.description: Opens all bookmarks in the folder into the current window.

openFolderInNewWindow.description: Opens all bookmarks in the folder into a new window.

openFolderInPrivateWindow.description: Opens all bookmarks in the folder into a private window.

deleteFolder.description: Delete the folder and all child nodes.

cutFolder.description: Remove the folder and its children and place it on the clipboard.

copyFolder.description: Copy the folder and its children onto the clipboard.

pasteFolder.description: Create the clipboard contents into this folder.
